about_the_game:
Mekaa Adventurers: the new DLC Desires Flowing is here, packed with a new class, new gameplay, new stories, and more replayability!

New Class - Puppeteers

Desires Flowing has a unique stand-alone gameplay, where the new class Puppeteers control Followers and dead spirits to fight for them. Expanding from the core gameplay of roguelike deckbuilding, players need to choose and manage a team of Followers that match their cards, so as to maximize the effects of both the Follower abilities and the deck build.

New Gameplay - Follower Mechanics

Recruit Followers during your journey or use cards to summon dead spirits. Follower intent will be triggered every turn. They could attack, defend, and apply special skills on enemies. Activate Follower skills to unleash max potential: "Trigger" Follower intent multiple times a turn, lock attack targets with "Brand", or "Sacrifice" Followers to gain crazy buff!

Dive Deeper into Lore of Mekaa

The Holy Copper Monastery, hidden in the forests between Riverpari and the Grayrock, worships a rare piece of magic copper. The believers, known as Puppeteers, use it to study the secrets of magic copper and cure diseases for believers. Unlike other organizations which use magic copper to develop industries, the Holy Copper Monastery believes that magic copper is a blessed cure for the world. One day, that piece of magic copper went missing, and so the Puppeteers embarked on a journey to find it......

New Features Overview

  • New Puppeteer class with 3 new characters

  • New Follower mechanics

  • 30 Follower options each with unique abilities

  • 100+ new Puppeteer cards

  • 13 new monsters

  • Follower events & class adventure stories
